channel.title: OC Transpo - Live Updates
channel.description: Daily route changes resulting from detours and cancelled trips are listed here by OC Transpo staff on weekdays, Saturdays until 9 pm and Sundays until 5 pm.

item.title: Queensway Station: Elevator
item.description:
October 17 2018 -

Queensway Station SB elevator # 3:
The southbound elevator on the east side of Queensway Station is out of service for unforeseen maintenance. We expect the elevator to be out of service for a few days and regret any inconvenience this may cause.

Customers requiring the use of an elevator to access another platform may be to use the one at the other end of the platform. For example: if you are getting off on the lower westbound platform and require access to the upper westbound platform, you will need to go to the other elevator on the westbound platform, take the elevator to the upper level, go to the other end of the platform and take the elevator down. Once down, go to the other end of the platform and take the elevator back up to the upper westbound platform.

For Travel Planning assistance, please call 613-741-4390 or press the free “Info” button on any Bell telephone in the station. For emergency assistance, use the nearest yellow emergency callbox.

item.title: DETOUR: Chapel Crescent Closure (Mann to Lees)
item.description:
October 15 2018 -

From 9am to 3:30 pm on October 16 and 17, 2018, Routes 16 and 85 will be detoured due to the Chapel Crescent Closure between Mann and Lees . Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour routing

  • Route 16 Main will serve Somerset, Chapel, Mann and Lees
  • Route 16 Britannia will serve Lees and Main
  • Route 85 Lees will serve King Edward and Lees
  • Route 85 Bayshore will serve Lees and King Edward

Affected stops

Bus stops (560#) NOT in use Routes Alternate service
# 6804 -- Chapel (east-side) and Wiggins 16 # 7617 -- Mann (south side) andChapel
85 # 6803 -- Lees (east side) and Chapel
# 6805 -- Chapel (west-side) and Wiggins 16 # 7621 -- Chapel (west side) and Mann
85 # 6806 -- Lees (west side) Chapel

item.title: Bayshore Station: Elevator
item.description:
October 12 2018 -

Bayshore SB elevator # 44:
The south elevator located at Bayshore, stop 4B, is out of service for maintenance. We expect the elevator to return to service on Oct. 19 at 3 pm. We regret any inconvenience this may cause.

Customers requiring the use of an elevator to access the eastbound Transitway or overhead tunnel to the mall are advised to: take the pedestrian crosswalk to the northbound side of the local platform and take the elevator to the overhead tunnel. This will bring you to the mall or the eastbound Transitway platform.

For Travel Planning assistance, please call 613-741-4390 or press the free “Info” button on any Bell telephone in the station. For emergency assistance, use the nearest yellow emergency callbox.

item.title: DETOUR: Piperville Road Closure
item.description:
October 03 2018 -

From 7 am on Monday, October 15 until 5 pm on Tuesday, October 30 2018, Route 222will be detoureddue to the Piperville Road closure between Anderson North leg and Anderson South leg. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour routing

  • Route 222 Downtown will serve Highway 417, Boundary, Piperville, Carlsbad Springs Community Centre Parking Lot, Piperville, Russell, Leitrim and Anderson.
  • Route 222 Vars will serve Highway 417, Anderson, Leitrim, Russell, Piperville, Carlsbad Springs Community Centre Parking Lot, Piperville, Boundary and Ramp to 417 Eastbound

Affected stops

# 1535 -- Anderson (west side) and Piperville

item.title: DETOUR: Dunrobin Road Closure
item.description:
October 02 2018 -

From 8:57 am on Wednesday, October 3 until further notice, Route 303 will be detoured due to the Dunrobin road closure. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour routing

  • Route 303 Carlingwood will serve from March Road.

Affected stops

Bus stops (560#) NOT in use Alternate service
# 6972 -- Porcupine and Cricket Temporary stop -- March and Dunrobin
# 6973 -- Porcupine and Cricket
# 6974 -- Dunrobin and Thomas A Dolan

item.title: DETOUR: St-Laurent Station Resurfacing
item.description:
September 27 2018 -

Routes 18, 40, 61, 62, 94, 95, 101, 104, 106 and 129 will be detoured on the following evenings due to the closure of St-Laurent Station bus only ramp. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

  • Nightly from 10:00 pm Monday, October 15 to 5:00 am Thursday, October 18.

Detour routing

  • Routes 18, 40, 61, 62, 101 and 106 St- Laurant will serve St-Laurent, Lemieux, Joseph, Cyrville, Ogilvie, St-Laurent and ramp to St-Laurent Station.
  • Route 94 Millennium will serve St-Laurent, Lemieux, Joseph, Cyrville, Ogilvie, St-Laurent and ramp to St-Laurent Station.
  • Route 95 Orléans & Trim will serve St-Laurent, Lemieux, Joseph, Cyrville, Ogilvie, St-Laurent and ramp to St-Laurent Station.
  • Route 104 Place d'Orléans will serve St-Laurent, Lemieux, Joseph, Cyrville, Ogilvie, St-Laurent and ramp to St-Laurent Station.
  • Route 129 Carson's and Aviation will serve St-Laurent, Lemieux, Joseph, Cyrville, Ogilvie, St-Laurent and ramp to St-Laurent Station

Affected stops

None

item.title: 34 Renaud peak-period trips extended to Saddleridge
item.description:
September 14 2018 -

Most peak-period trips on Route 34 Renaud have been extended to Saddleridge via Joshua.

item.title: DETOUR EXTENDED: River Road Closure (Rideau to Earl Armstrong)
item.description:
August 31 2018 -

From 9 am on Monday, September 10 until 6 pm on Saturday, December 15 2018, Route 299will be detoureddue to the River Road closure between Rideau and Earl Armstrong. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour routing

  • Route 299 LeBreton will serve River, Rideau, Spratt, Earl Armstrong and Riverview Station
  • Route 299 Manotick will serve Riverview Park & Ride, Earl Armstrong, Spratt, Rideau and River

Affected stops

Bus stops (560#) NOT in use Alternate service
# 2121 -- River (east-side) and Nicholls Island # 0971 -- River (east-side) and Rideau
# 0976 -- River (east-side) and Nicholls Island

# 2011 -- 752 River (west-side)
# 0975 -- 806 River (west-side) # 0972 -- River (west-side) and Rideau
# 2122 -- River (west-side) and Nicholls Island

item.title: DETOUR: Queen Street Closure
item.description:
August 29 2018 -

FromSunday, September 2 2018 until further notice, Routes 6, 7, 12, 16, 18 and 19will be detoureddue to the Queen Street closure. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour routing

  • Route 6 Downtown will serve Bank, Wellington and Rideau
  • Route 6 Greenboro will serve Rideau, Wellington and Bank
  • Route 7 St-Laurent will serve Bank, Wellington and Rideau
  • Route 7 Carleton University will serve Rideau, Wellington and Bank
  • Route 12 Rideau (only some trips) will serve Rideau, Elgin, Queen, O'Connor and Albert
  • Route 16 Britannia will serve Mackenzie King and Albert
  • Route 16 Main will serve Slater and Mackenzie King
  • Route 18 Parliament will serve Rideau, Wellington and O'Connor
  • Route 18 St-Laurent will serve Bank, Wellington and Rideau
  • Route 19 St-Laurent will serve Slater and Mackenzie King
  • Route 19 Mackenzie King will serve Mackenzie King and Albert

The Travel Planner will reflect the final routing that will be in place once Queen Street reopens.

Make sure you check the detour notes in your trip plans and schedules.

Affected stops

Bus stops (560#) NOT in use Routes Alternate service
# 7557 -- Elgin (east-side) and Wellington 6,7 # 3009 -- Rideau 3A (south-side) and Nicholas
# 1228 -- Queen (north-side) and Metcalfe 6, 7 # 7691 -- Wellington (north-side) and Metcalfe
16 # 3001 -- Albert (north-side) and Metcalfe
# 7558 -- Elgin (west-side) and Queen 6, 7 # 7691 -- Wellington (north-side) and Metcalfe
# 3052 -- Parliament Station B 6, 7 # 7692 -- Wellington (north-side) and O'Connor
16, 19 # 3002 -- Albert (north-side) and Bank
# 3052 -- Parliament Station A 6, 7, 18 # 7546 -- Bank (east-side) and Sparks
16 # 3007 -- Slater (south-side) and Bank
19 # 3008 -- Slater (south-side) and Metcalfe
12 # 3002 -- Albert and Bank
# 1368 -- Queen (south-side) and Kent 16 # 3006 -- Slater (south-side) and Kent
12 # 3002 -- Albert and Bank
# 7683 -- Queen (north-side) and Kent 16 # 3003 -- Albert (north-side) and Kent
# 1512 -- Queen (south-side) and Metcalfe 6, 7, 18 # 7694 -- Wellington (south-side) and Metcalfe
16 # 3008 -- Slater (south-side) and Metcalfe
# 3051 -- Lyon Station B 16 # 3006 -- Slater (south-side) and Kent
# 3051 -- Lyon Station A 16 # 3003 -- Albert (north-side) and Kent
# 7549 -- Bay (east-side) and Queen 16 # 3005 -- Slater (south-side) and Bay

item.title: DETOUR: Bell High School - Bruin Lane
item.description:
August 27 2018 -

From Wednesday, August 22nd at 12:00 noon until October 2018, routes 88, 152, 660, 661, 665, 681, and 669 will be detoured due to the closure of Bruin Lane from Cassidy to the Bruin Lane mid-point. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travels.

Detour Routing

  • Trips to Bell High School will serve the south entrance, Bruin (westbound), and a temporary stop on the south side of the school
  • Trips from Bell High School will serve the temporary stop on the south side of the school and Bruin (westbound)

Affected Stops

Bus Stop (560#) NOT in use Alternate Service
# 5304 -- Bell H.S. / Cassidy Stop will be temporarily relocated approximately 150m southeast to the south side of the school on Bruin Lane
# 5305 -- Bell H.S. Stop will be temporarily relocated approximately 400m south to the south side fo the school on Bruin Lane

From7:00 AM on Tuesday July 10th until 6:00 PM on Friday November 30th 2018, route 7 will be detoured due to the closure of Seneca Street between Sunnyside and Grove. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour Routing

Affected Stops

Bus Stops (560#) NOT in use Alternate Service
# 6737 -- Seneca (west-side) and Glen

# 6683 -- Sunnyside and Seneca

# 6685 -- Grove and Leonard

# 6738 -- Grove (south-side) and Seneca
# 6685 -- Grove (south-side) and Leonard Temporary Stop at Grove (north-side) and Leonard

item.title: DETOUR: McBean Bridge (between Strachan and Royal York)
item.description:
June 13 2018 -

From Wednesday, June 20th 2018 until late fall 2018, routes 283 and 301 will be detoured due to construction work taking place on the McBean Bridge between Strachan Street and Royal York Street. Route 301 will be detoured on Mondays only.

Detour Routing

  • Route 283 Mackenzie King will serve King, Royal York, McBean, Ottawa, Eagleson, Perth, McBean, and Strachan
  • Route 283 Mackenzie King (trips from Munster and Flewellyn) will serve Eagleson, Ottawa, King, Royal York, McBean, Ottawa, Eagleson, Perth, McBean, and Strachan
  • Route 283 Richmond will serve McBean, Perth, Eagleson, Ottawa, McBean, Royal York, and King
  • Route 283 Richmond (trips to Munster and Flewellyn) will serve Strachan, McBean, Perth, Eagleson, Ottawa, McBean, Royal York, King, Ottawa, Eagleson, and Perth
  • Route 283 Richmond (trips to Stittsville from Richmond) will serve Strachan, McBean, Perth, Eagleson, Ottawa, McBean, Royal York, King, Ottawa, Eagleson, and Perth
  • Route 301 Carlingwood will serve King, Royal York, McBean, Ottawa, Eagleson, Perth, McBean, and Strachan
  • Route 301 Richmond will serve McBean, Perth, Eagleson, Ottawa, McBean, Royal York, and King

Affected Stops

Bus Stops (560#) NOT in use Alternate Service
# 6278 -- McBean (west-side) and Strachan Stop will be temporarily relocated approximately 50 m northwest to Strachan (south-side) and McBean
# 6281 -- McBean (west-side) and Royal York Stop will be temporarily relocated approximately 100 m northeast to Royal York (north-side) and McBean

Detour Maps

283 Mackenzie King

283 Mackenzie King (trips from Munster and Flewellyn)

283 Richmond

283 Richmond (trips to Munster and Flewellyn)

283 Richmond (trips to Stittsville from Richmond)

301 Carlingwood

301 Richmond

item.title: Elgin Street Construction
item.description:
March 08 2018 -

Routes 5 and 14 will continue their regular routes during Elgin Street construction beginning March 12, 2018. Construction may cause delays.
